unnormalised: My grandma, Lakshmi, swears by Ayurveda! Back in Kerala, for Onam, she'd get a full body massage at the Vaidyaratnam Ayurveda College near Thrissur. It helped her with her joint pain, she says she felt 10 years younger. We used to travel 20km for it! Even now, at 85, she incorporates Ayurvedic principles. She avoids processed foods and loves her biryani with lots of ginger. She says it's the secret to her long life!
normalised: My grandma, Lakshmi, swears by Ayurveda! Back in Kerala, for Onam, she'd get a full body massage at the Vaidyaratnam Ayurveda College near Thrissur. It helped her with her joint pain, she says she felt ten years younger. We used to travel twenty kilometer for it! Even now, at eighty five, she incorporates Ayurvedic principles. She avoids processed foods and loves her biryani with lots of ginger. She says it's the secret to her long life!
